news.title: The Papers: Russian assets 'deal' plan and 'Joe the GOAT'
news.summary: A mixed range of stories feature on Friday's front page - but many picture England cricketer Joe Root after his heroics in the Ashes.

news.title: Frustration and anger - why 'huge question marks' hang over Man Utd
news.summary: Ruben Amorim declared himself as angry and frustrated as his Manchester United side again lost a lead to draw 1-1 with West Ham.

news.title: England World Cup subs might stay indoors - Tuchel
news.summary: England manager Thomas Tuchel says he may have his substitutes stay in the dressing room during matches at the World Cup next summer because of the risks posed by high temperatures.
